release.action: Added implementation for 1.1 API methods. Added class OutdatedDirectoryMessage and updated the implementation to notify applications about an outdated directory.

Added interface BankfileProvider and class PropertyBankfileProvider implementing the former bankfile lookup mechanism backed by a property file. Updated class BundesbankBankleitzahlenVerzeichnis to use any available BankfileProvider implementation for reading bankfile resources.
Updated the XML module descriptor to the 1.1 model version. Removed class org.jdtaus.banking.ri.blzdirectory.OutdatedDirectoryMessage in favour of the new jdtaus-banking-messages artifact.
Updated class org.jdtaus.banking.ri.blzdirectory.BundesbankBankleitzahlenVerzeichnis to use task monitoring when loading bankfiles.
Added a recent bankfile valid from 2007-09-03 to 2007-12-02.
Added a recent bankfile valid from 2007-12-03 to 2008-03-02.
Added a recent bankfile valid from 2008-03-03 to 2008-06-08 and rebuild with latest mojo releases.
Added a recent bankfile valid to 2008-09-07.
Added a recent bankfile valid to 2008-12-07.

Upgraded to latest core features.
  • Removed any internal properties resources and moved any messages to the META-INF/jdtaus/module.xml module descriptor.
  • Added support for compatibility checking.
Added a recent bankfile valid to 2009-03-08.
Upgraded to jDTAUS Core version 1.8 to support exchanging references to the java.util.Locale implementation to use.
